title: Salaar (Telugu )
writer: Sandeep Reddy Bandla, Manish Bhavan, Choudary Hanuman
short_cast: Prabhas, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Shruthi Haasan, Jagapathi Babu
cast: Prabhas, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Shruthi Haasan, Jagapathi Babu
genre: Crime Movies, Action & Adventure Movies, Telugu-Language Movies
desc: The fate of a violently contested kingdom hangs on the fraught bond between two friends-turned-foes in this saga of power, bloodshed and betrayal.
